attributes.action: Mark bird for government champion for Nursing Homes, making providers of nursing
attributes.additional_details:
Press, poor care, failing authorities 
Vulnerable persons ignored due to policitians who have no idea or are led by those who have no idea what it is like to support people
attributes.background:
I am a experienced health care worker
I am competent 
I am professional
I am street wise to care
I am able to see past tick boxes and actually deliver the right care, 
I am caring, operationally safe, registered nurse manager with 25 years service in the NHS, police force, and nursing homes

rejection.details: You could start a petition asking for changes to policy on nursing homes, if you would like to do so.
